players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.

Bob: "I think it's important that we all share our thoughts and suspicions openly to help identify the mafia among us. Based on the information we have so far, I believe Charlie's silence during the last discussion was suspicious and warrants further investigation."
Charlie: "I will remain silent as I gather more information. However, I encourage everyone to continue sharing their thoughts and suspicions openly."
